This program will take you behind the scenes of the production of various artists belonging to the up-front group.
We will show you our recording, rehearsal, and other production processes.
Let's start with a behind-the-scenes look at the two MCs.
I, Sakura Oda, will be talking about Morning Musume。' 23 dressed up for Halloween for the first time.

I would like to show that kind of thing to my fans more and more.

I tend to post only pictures on social networking sites like Instagram, but I want people to see me in action.
But recently I've been thinking that I want people to see me in action as well.
So I have started to take and post not only photos, but also videos of me in action. I have started taking and posting not only photos, but also videos of me in action.
I'm glad that many people are happy with the results, so I'd like to keep doing it.
I would like to continue to do so in the future.
I'd like to continue to post more and more of our videos to our fans.

I was there 10 years ago, so this was my second time to have Leslie Key take pictures of me, and I had told him that morning that I was looking forward to it, saying that the fact that he was at this site today meant that this was the best site in Asia.
The moment I saw the group arrangement, I remembered how I felt 10 years ago, and I thought that this was Leslie Kee's arrangement.
I was really impressed with the poses and the angles of the legs, and when I looked at the finished photos again, I thought how beautiful the photos looked.

I was also impressed by the unexpected speed at which the shooting progressed. I thought that this was the speed of Lesliquie's shooting, and at first I couldn't hide my confusion. I thought, "Oh my God, we've already finished shooting.

I had never met them before, so I knew how they were going to proceed like this, and when I saw the finished product, I really felt that they had thought about the angles at which each member looked beautiful, and everyone looked great. I was really happy to have Leslie Kee's picture taken of me. I had never met them before, so I learned about the process of the event, and I was really impressed by the angles at which the members looked beautiful. I was really happy to have Leslie Key take my picture.

Next is here. Tea Horse Ruri Hiromoto's hair arrangement
Here is Ruri Hiromoto's hair arrangement. This time, she shows us a braided arrangement. Please take a look.
My name is Ruri Hiromoto from Ocha-no-Ma.
Today I would like to introduce Ruri Hiromoto's braided hair arrangement.
There are two types of braided hair arrangement: back braiding and front braiding,There are two types of braiding arrangements: back braiding and front braiding,
I change them according to the mood of the outfit at the time,
The front braid is used for a soft and fluffy look, or when you are wearing cute clothes like today.
I use the back knitting when I want to make a tight knit or when I want to make a tight knit for a performance,
In this article, I would like to show you the difference between the outer and inner knitting on the right and left sides.
Let's start with the front knitting.
Let's start from this side,
First, take a little bit from the top.
When I divide the front braid into three parts, I cover the top part of the braid like a normal braid.
Then, the third time, I take a little bit of the front side, and this time, I put it over the front side and take a little bit of the back side.
Then, pull this front side again, and add it here again.
And now, the back side is placed on top like this, which is the outer knitting.
And at this time, I'm moving the back side more and more.
If you take everything from the front to the back, it will look like it's peeling off.
It tends to look peeled off.
It's like this area is pulled too much.
That's why I took the braid from the back until the middle of the braid.
When it comes to the bottom, you can gently cover it.
It makes it look like there's a good amount of hair.
I think it makes it look like there's a good amount of hair.
I think it gives a nice finish.
And when I'm braiding...
I take out all the hairs that I just took out.
If you go too far to the back when you're braiding
If you go too far back, you won't be able to see the braid on the front side.
So you need to keep it close to the face.
and the braid should be right behind the ear.
It's a good idea to do it while being conscious of it.
You can do it however you like.
The last part of the braid tends to be a little bit loose. And the last part tends to be a little bit loose.
I think it tends to go down a little bit here.
I think it's better to take it all off in one go at the end.
The finished product will be very beautiful.
I'm fine with taking it all off in one go.
It's better that way.
It looks more beautiful.
And then, braid from here to the bottom, like this.
Like this. It's cute if you braid all the way to the bottom.
It's cute if you braid all the way to the bottom, but if you curl the braid in advance like this, it's also pretty cute if you leave the bottom part curled and tie it.
And from here, depending on the day, you can pull it out a little bit at a time.
When you pull it out, you can see the main part of the braid.
When you pull out the braid, it's better to pull out the braid at the back of the braid.
It's cuter if you pull the braid out.
It looks fluffier if you pull this braid.
This is the front braid.
Next, I'd like to braid this side in the back.
When I wore the white and member-color costumes that I've been wearing since before I made my major debut, I used to braid my hair into a twin hairstyle, right?
I used to do this back braid, but what's different is that I divided it into three parts.
I used to do this backstitching, but what's different is that I divided it into three sections.
And then I'm going to do the same thing, starting from the front and working my way down.
Take it from here and put it down.
Take it from here and put it on the bottom.
This is the difference between back knitting and front knitting.
And the point to be careful is the same as before,
The back knitting is the one you need to pay attention to,
The back braid looks more neat and clean.
If it goes too far back, it will not look good from the front,
It's more cute to have the braid all the way down here,
That's a point you should be aware of when you're back braiding. That is a point that we should be aware of when knitting in the back.
Yes, I am aware of that. This is back knitting.
In the front knitting, the knit is in the middle, but in the back knitting, the knit is on the front...oh, no, it's not.
The knitting is on the top. It goes on and on and on and on.
The difference is that when you knit the reverse side, you pull out the whole of the knitting,
I personally think it's prettier to pull out a little bundle of hair thinly when it's knitted backwards.
And this one is more like a braid, isn't it? The braid is showing.
I think it's easier to make it fluffy here.
So, the braid is done!
As I said at the beginning, this side is the front braid, and this side is the back braid.
Well, when it's braided in the front, it gives a fluffy look, so it looks cute when you wear a cute outfit like this,
On the other hand, when you wear show pants, or in summer....
On the other hand, when you wear a sleeveless shirt, a white shirt like "The Natsu" and jeans, this is more suitable.
I think it looks tighter, so please try it depending on your needs.
You can also try tying it here and then curling it to make a bear or something, so please experiment!
That's all for now, this is Reiri Hiramoto at tea time.
